name: Rush Ball - Color Circle Rider
description:
This is our brand new arcade game where you have to dodge obstacles and go as far as you can.

The concept of the game is very simple. Tap the screen to speed up and accelerate the moving ball and avoid the various obstacles on the way.

Main Features:

- Simple one touch game
- Addictive and endless gameplay.
- Minimalist graphics and design.

Ready for the challenge? Download the game today for free and start playing. Have fun!
